'''Notes'''
Most of things work out of the box in Precise Pangolin. Wifi requires proprietary drivers through "jockey-gtk"
"soft" multimedia keys above the keyboard work fine. Also included infrared remote control works fine. 
HDMI with audio works well but only with proprietary Nvidia driver. Without only video works on HDMI.
Build in finger print sensor works with "print-demo" but only when run as root (identified as AuthenTec AES2501)
Initially I thought that card reader (Ricoh Co Ltd R5C822 SD/SDIO/MMC/MS/MSPro Host Adapter) works because if you put SD card in, it appears and get mounted. However you can not open anytning on it. There is a bug open for it - https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/311781 and https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/202490 and https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.22/+bug/111089
